name: CastleEscape (MarcusFromOz)
description:
This is not a full game, it is simply a prototype from an Unreal course by GameDev.tv.
It does however demonstrate what you can do with some study (couple of weeks) and some free assets in Unreal Engine 4.
If you are interested in trying out Unreal then please go ahead and download to have a look, but if you are looking for a full game you may want to go elsewhere.

Gameplay

- WASD to move

- Right Mouse click to pick up items ( very important *Hint Hint* )
